original_text: King David was living in his palace. One day, he said to Nathan the prophet, ‘Now I am living in a beautiful palace that is made of cedar wood. But the Lord's Covenant Box is still in a tent.’ Chronicles 16 Chronicles 18
korean_text: 다윗이 그의 궁전에 거주할 때에 다윗이 선지자 나단에게 이르되 나는 백향목 궁에 거주하거늘 여호와의 언약궤는 휘장 아래에 있도다

sentences.original_text: King David was living in his palace
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕이 그의 궁에 살고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: One day, he said to Nathan the prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 그는 선지자 나단에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: Now I am living in a beautiful palace
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이제 아름다운 궁에 살고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that is made of cedar wood
